channel.title: Simple Home Page
channel.description: [B]I designed a simple home page for those who are new to coding websites. It's simple, and clean. [IMG]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/589/766fb24e07dc41629d85dc4.png[/img] [IMG]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/8927/c9193f724cec40a196137c2.png[/img] [IMG]http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/6506/910b252b33434f39814cdcd.png[/img] Ok. So in the updates section you want to add images, right? Here's the html code: [code] [/code] Link html code: [code] [/code] Want to add a banner? Here's the html code: [code] [/code] [b]Also adding a logo: [url=http://www.netmechanic.com/news/vol6/css_no5.htm]CSS Tip: Creating Logos Using CSS[/url] Mediafire: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?q5sdih1v0enw6rw]Simple Home Page.zip[/url] Uppit: [URL=http://uppit.com/54zdxrv9ntlu/Simple_Home_Page.zip]Simple Home Page.zip - 610 KB[/URL] NOTE: This is good for beginners I think. I hope to see this put to good use! CREDITS: 100% Me. [img]http://img684.imageshack.us/img684/9551/0c145a2d1c004b5eab20202.png[/img]

item.title: Simple Home Page
item.dc:creator: @Tozeo Tozeo
item.description:
@Tozeo wrote:

[B]I designed a simple home page for those who are new to coding websites. It’s simple, and clean.



Ok. So in the updates section you want to add images, right? Here’s the html code:

<img src="url to image here" alt="the title" />

Link html code:

<a href="url to site here" alt="the title" />

Want to add a banner? Here’s the html code:

<a href="url to page here"><img src="url to image here"></img></a>

[b]Also adding a logo: CSS Tip: Creating Logos Using CSS

Mediafire: Simple Home Page.zip
Uppit: Simple Home Page.zip - 610 KB

NOTE: This is good for beginners I think.
I hope to see this put to good use!

CREDITS: 100% Me.

Read full topic
